title: Information-Based Risk Management and Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic risk management concepts and foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Education aimed at improving risk awareness and information-based decision-making skills for professionals. Composed of smartphone-based microlearning content, emphasizing case-centered learning applicable to real-world contexts.

learning_goals: Learners systematically analyze risk factors in real work environments using an information-based risk classification system
Learners establish risk response strategies for specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) by applying a risk management framework
Learners write result reports applying risk management theories to actual cases through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
